text.section: If the Department determines that an entity is capable of administering a microenterprise loan program, the entity may originate and administer loans to microenterprises in accordance with standards the Department adopts by regulation.

section.section: The Department shall adopt regulations to establish standards for determining the eligibility of an entity to administer a microenterprise loan program.

The standards shall include provisions on:
the size, training, and experience of the professional staff that would administer the program; and
the capability of the professional staff to:
determine financial capacity of a borrower;
originate a loan; and
evaluate applications for program loans.
